attributes.action: Give the exam students of 2021 a clear explanation of what is going to happen
attributes.additional_details: It’s unfair for many to have to have gone through the struggles of not being at school for the last sixth months and know not know what is going to happen. The government need to make clear what is going to happen as soon as possible
attributes.background: The government need to make it clear if they intend to make any changes to the exams, for example if they will be pushed or not as it is creating uncertainty for many students.
